title: Accounting and economic profits  for Raheem

content.question: Raheem is currently working as a financial analyst earning <math alttext="$75,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>$75,000</mtext></math> a year and is considering quitting his current job to start an art gallery. The estimated annual revenue from the art gallery is <math alttext="$175,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>$175,000</mtext></math>. The annual cost of labor, advertising, and acquiring the art inventory is <math alttext="$125,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>$125,000</mtext></math>. What are Raheem’s accounting and economic profits if he opens the art gallery?

choices.label: Accounting profit is <math alttext="negative $25,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>25</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>, and economic profit is <math alttext="$50,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>50</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>.

Accounting profit is <math alttext="$100,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>100</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>, and economic profit is <math alttext="$50,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>50</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>.

Accounting profit is <math alttext="$50,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>50</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>, and economic profit is <math alttext="negative $25,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>25</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>.

Accounting profit is <math alttext="$100,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>100</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>, and economic profit is <math alttext="negative $25,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>25</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>.

Accounting profit is <math alttext="$50,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>50</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>, and economic profit is <math alttext="$100,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>100</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>.

content.answer: Accounting profit is <math alttext="$50,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>50</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>, and economic profit is <math alttext="negative $25,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">$</mi><mn>25</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></math>.
